items.title: Aim to reach top three in decorative paints within three years: Parth Jindal
items.description: JSW Paints MD Parth Jindal noted that while AkzoNobel's Dulux has significant market share in the premium segment and JSW Paints has good sales in the value market, the partners will work out the distribution model based on geography

items.title: Avendus sale faces delay as KKR, Gaja Capital squabble over exit premium
items.description: The deal, valued at approximately $700 million, will mark Mizuho's biggest investment in India, reflecting a major commitment to the Indian market

items.title: Automakers clash with Centre over ‘aggressive’ emission limits
items.description: Plans to cut car emissions by a third from 2027, more than twice the pace of its previous target, risks the sustainability of the industry, according to a SIAM note

items.title: Metro Brands: Is demand traction adding spring in its step?
items.description: Metro Brands will continue to expand network and focus on rolling out premium products
